name: airportgap-api-testing
description: Pruebas automatizadas de API para Airport Gap usando Postman y Newman

scripts.test: newman run collections/airportgap_postman.json -e environments/airportgap_env.json -r html,json --reporter-html-export reports/airportgap_report.html --reporter-json-export reports/airportgap_report.json
